title: Block font with a unique A
content:
I have tried the various font identifiers, but none have been able to identify it, or even come up with a good alternative.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141024022044im_/http:/typophile.com/files/name_6174.JPG)
author: tsheridan

comments.content: Benguiat Bold or ITC Benguiat Bold
